column4: i just downloaded google earth from its site ... got a google earth.bin file .. how do install it please help
make it executable chmod +X ./googleearth.bin
then do ./googlearth.bin and it will start intsallatino
it says no such file or directory .. but i can see the file in downloads, i also went to that path in shell and gave the command there but it still says no such file
do  -  cd /home/<username>/Downloads then do chmod +x ./google.bin and then do ./google.bin repale that name with proper name
its installing .. thanks
yah
is your lucid 64 bit?>
no i just installed this the 32 bit yesterday .. am a noob :)
good. :D :P
the program installed but it crashed when i ran it says google earth has a bug
you are talking about the current installatino? the one we did just now?
yeah .. it installed but when i ran it crashed . says it has a bug ... then it didnt show up in my programs menu thing imtrying to run it thru shell again but cant
how do i undo it?
wait trying to find some solution
ok, thanks
i think i found a forum fix .. im trying that ill let you know how it turns out
sure
wierd thing .. it installed with tons of errors and then it crashed .. but now i found the icon in app/internet and clicked it and google earth works
:D
glad to know!!!
